content:
During air alarm in the Dnieper, an explosion. Russia's troops were hit by a rocket.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak.

“A rocket attack on the Dnieper. There are victims. According to preliminary information, these are five people. We clarify all the details, ”he said.

As reportedArmyinform, the invaders fired 35 times the border of Chernihiv and Sumy region.
title: 5 people were injured: the invaders fired the Dnieper again
description: This was reported by the head of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak. "Missile attack on the Dnieper ....
author: Army Inform
